comments:
Build I20030206_1700

I was working with the CVS Repository perspective while testing the build,  and
wanted to switch back to the Resource perspecitve which did not work. Consulting
the .log showed the following NPEs:

Note: even "Close All" does not remove the "dead" resource perspective. I had to
kill the window.

Trying to reproduce now.....

...failed. Couldn't reproduce.

The NPE happened while testing the new "Show in" feature.

It seems that you tried to close all perspectives and if failed with a NPE. 
All other exception are concequence of the first one.

Marking as dup of bug 31954 since the exception is the same.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 31954 ***
